channel.title: 3ds max, bone messed up.
channel.description:
Alright, so I have no idea how to explain this so besides interpretive dance I'll show you a picture.
![](upload://dxCyqt0RJdmvv8jjsB8YeXUuaQT.jpeg)
I have NO idea what happened, so if anyone can give me advice on how to fix this, I'd GREATLY appreciate it.
If I move the Cat rig thats parented to the bone, it'll be move the bone and if I move the bone it still moves the mesh. But it acts as if its frozen if I'm trying to move any other bones. (if I grab the whole arm it still wont move or even be SELECTED if I double click like the CAT hand for example.)

item.title: 3ds max, bone messed up.
item.dc:creator: elevenbravo
item.description:
Alright, so I have no idea how to explain this so besides interpretive dance I’ll show you a picture.

1156×616 144 KB

I have NO idea what happened, so if anyone can give me advice on how to fix this, I’d GREATLY appreciate it.

If I move the Cat rig thats parented to the bone, it’ll be move the bone and if I move the bone it still moves the mesh. But it acts as if its frozen if I’m trying to move any other bones. (if I grab the whole arm it still wont move or even be SELECTED if I double click like the CAT hand for example.)

Read full topic
